about_the_game:
《Box Cats Puzzle - Cat Year 2022》is a small physics game. You need to stack multiple cats of different shapes on top of each other, so that you can pass the level by keeping them from falling for a certain period of time.

The new DLC contains:

  • 41 fun levels
  • We have added two new cats
  • Of course we also have a new BGM

Important things:

No cat was injured during the level production process, such as fall injuries, overweight crush injuries, etc.
This DLC is free, I wish you all a Merry Christmas and good luck in the Year of the Tiger (Good luck in the Year of the Cat)
detailed_description:
《Box Cats Puzzle - Cat Year 2022》is a small physics game. You need to stack multiple cats of different shapes on top of each other, so that you can pass the level by keeping them from falling for a certain period of time.

The new DLC contains:

  • 41 fun levels
  • We have added two new cats
  • Of course we also have a new BGM

Important things:

No cat was injured during the level production process, such as fall injuries, overweight crush injuries, etc.
This DLC is free, I wish you all a Merry Christmas and good luck in the Year of the Tiger (Good luck in the Year of the Cat)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Core Duo 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Core Duo 3.2GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

  • Processor: Core Duo 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: 《Box Cats Puzzle - The year of tiger》is a small physics game. You need to stack multiple cats of different shapes on top of each other, so that you can pass the level by keeping them from falling for a certain period of time.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
